about_the_game:
A demo with an average of 30 minutes of gameplay:

Key Features:

Precise Platforming Challenges: Face trials that require quick reflexes and precise jumping as you venture through a temple full of secrets and dangers.
Metroidvania Exploration: Unlock new abilities and hidden areas as you recover fragments of Tootum’s memories, grow stronger and make your way out of the temple.
Intuitive Storytelling: Experience an engaging story without dialogue; Tootum’s journey is told through animations and environmental interactions, offering a rich experience where every detail matters.
Immersive Design: Enjoy a gameplay experience that combines the tension of precise jumping with the satisfaction of exploring a world full of secrets and clever puzzles.
Get ready for a journey where skill and intelligence are essential. Discover Tootum's secrets and reclaim the power that lies dormant within him. Tootum's fate—and yours—hangs in the balance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-core de 2,0 GHz ou superior.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU com suporte a OpenGL 2.1 (NVIDIA GeForce 6000 Series, AMD Radeon HD 2000 Series, ou equivalente).
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-core de 2.5 GHz ou superior.
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU com suporte a OpenGL 2.1 (NVIDIA GeForce 6000 Series, AMD Radeon HD 2000 Series, ou equivalente).
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX

short_description: Awaken as Tootum, an entity trapped in an ancient temple. Embark on a journey of precise platforming and deep exploration, unlocking secrets and abilities as you discover your true identity. Each leap and each discovery brings us closer to the truth.
